title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 398-12.2 - Calculation of equivalent benefits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 398-12.2 - Calculation of equivalent benefits

State Regulations

The district must calculate the amount of equivalent
benefits in accordance with this subpart. The district must calculate interim
assistance in accordance with Part 353 of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
§§
398-12.2

Adopted by

New

York State Register September 24, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 38, eff. 10/1/2014. Amended

New

York State Register January 13, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 02, eff. 1/13/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
